results.content: The course was build on the go and lecture made many typo mistakes but doesn't actually take the effort to correct it. The course can be followed until tutorial 39. Tutorial 40 requires some templates which author did not provide the files for download. Will have to watch the video until the course end and not able to follow it. Overall the course could have been better if author could edit the videos by removing the mistakes. The course ended just with the implementation of models/products in the template but didn't go through the shopping cart system for checking out. To me it is a half way course. Anyway, can see there's some effort from the Author to create this tutorial but the effort fade off when courses progressing til the end.

response.content: Thank you for your review, actually the templates code available on github you can just download the entire project with templates from github, and going to find the mistake from this courses and finally, I am working on the remaining videos I will update the courses very soon.
response.content_html: Thank you for your review, actually the templates code available on github you can just download the entire project with templates from github, and going to find the mistake from this courses and finally, I am working on the remaining videos I will update the courses very soon.
